settings.title: Settings
settings.saveSuccess: Your configuration has been updated successfully.
settings.testApiFirst: Please test your API connection before saving.

modelConfig.title: Model Configuration
modelConfig.editProviderDesc: Update the configuration for this provider.
modelConfig.addProviderDesc: Configure a new AI model provider.
modelConfig.deleteProviderConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this provider? This action cannot be undone.
modelConfig.selectProviderFirst: Please select a provider and model first

platformConfig.title: Platform Configuration
platformConfig.description: Configure Android and Web automation settings
platformConfig.screenshotDirDesc: Path on Android device where screenshots will be saved
platformConfig.xmlDirDesc: Path on Android device where UI hierarchy XML files will be saved
platformConfig.sdkPathDesc: Path to Android SDK directory (contains platform-tools and emulator folders)
platformConfig.browserTypeDesc: Playwright browser engine to use for web automation
platformConfig.headlessDesc: Whether to run browser in headless mode (no visible window)

agentConfig.title: Agent Behavior
agentConfig.description: Configure AI agent behavior and performance settings
agentConfig.maxTokensTooltip: Maximum number of tokens the model can generate per response
agentConfig.temperatureTooltip: Controls randomness: 0 = more focused, 2 = more creative
agentConfig.requestIntervalTooltip: Delay between consecutive model requests (to avoid rate limits)
agentConfig.maxRoundsTooltip: Maximum number of exploration rounds before stopping
agentConfig.minDistTooltip: Minimum pixel distance for UI element detection
agentConfig.darkModeDesc: Use dark theme for agent-generated outputs

imageConfig.title: Image Optimization
imageConfig.description: Configure image processing settings for screenshots and UI captures
imageConfig.enableOptimizationDesc: Compress and resize images to reduce file size and improve performance
imageConfig.maxWidthTooltip: Images wider than this will be resized while maintaining aspect ratio
imageConfig.maxHeightTooltip: Images taller than this will be resized while maintaining aspect ratio
imageConfig.qualityTooltip: JPEG compression quality (higher = better quality, larger files)

preferencesConfig.title: Preferences
preferencesConfig.systemLanguageDesc: Choose the language for the application interface

dangerZoneConfig.title: Danger Zone
dangerZoneConfig.resetConfigDesc: Delete configuration file and return to setup wizard
dangerZoneConfig.resetDialogDesc: This will delete all your settings and redirect you to the setup wizard.
dangerZoneConfig.resetDialogRedirect: You will be redirected to the setup wizard to reconfigure everything.

projects.title: Projects
projects.emptyDesc: Create your first project to get started
projects.selectProject: Select a project to view details
projects.selectProjectDesc: Choose a project from the sidebar to view its tasks and details.
projects.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

createDialog.title: Create New Project
createDialog.description: Create a new automation project. Enter a project name, optionally select a workspace directory, and choose a platform (Android or Web).
createDialog.projectNameDesc: The name of the app or website you want to automate.
createDialog.workspaceDirDesc: The directory where project data and outputs will be stored.
createDialog.createFailedRetry: Failed to create project. Please try again.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.emptyDesc: Add your first task to start automating
tasks.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

createDialog.title: Create New Task
createDialog.description: Create a new automation task for your project. Select a project, enter a task description, and choose a model to run the task.
createDialog.appSourceDesc: The app will be installed (if needed) and launched before running the task
createDialog.taskPlaceholderWeb:
Describe what you want to automate...
For example: "Search for React tutorials and take a screenshot of the top 3 results"

Press Cmd/Ctrl + Enter to submit
createDialog.taskPlaceholderAndroid:
Describe what you want to automate on the Android app...
For example: "Like the top 5 posts on the home feed"

Press Cmd/Ctrl + Enter to submit
createDialog.maxRoundsTooltip: Prevents infinite loops and limits automation attempts
createDialog.maxRoundsDesc: Maximum number of exploration rounds before stopping
createDialog.taskQueuedDesc: Another task is running. This task will start automatically when the queue is free.

alerts.enterUrl: Please enter a URL for web automation
alerts.provideApk: Please provide an APK file or Play Store URL

setup.title: Setup Wizard
setup.welcomeDesc: Let's set up your environment to get started

complete.title: Setup Complete
complete.description: You're all set! Start creating projects.

schedules.title: Scheduled Tasks
schedules.emptyDesc: Schedule a task to run at a specific time
schedules.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this scheduled task?
